summary: A teenage girl has problems with her family and life when her little brother is born with a heart problem.
cast: Ragne Veensalu|Lenna Kuurmaa|Andres Lõo|Viire Valdma|Ivo Uukkivi|Ene Rämmeld|Tiit Lilleorg|Taavi Eelmaa|Piret Kalda|Kaie Mihkelson|Argo Aadli|Lauri Lagle|Rene Markov|Teele Kepler|Birgit Hallist|Marju Alumäe|Freddy Grenzmann|Ago Roo|Enrico Zirnask|Margus Prangel|Anti Reinthal|Rein Oja|Toomas Hussar
title: Kuhu põgenevad hinged
